targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time,$__interval),
  avg(aqi) AS "aqi"
FROM registros
WHERE
  region IN ($Provincia) AND
  city IN ($estacion) AND
  $__timeFilter(time)
GROUP by
  city, time
ORDER by city asc, time desc

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time,$__interval),
  city AS metric,
  avg(aqi) AS "aqi"
FROM registros
WHERE
  region IN ($Provincia) AND
  city IN ($estacion) AND
  $__timeFilter(time)
GROUP BY 1, 2
ORDER BY 1, 2

panels.title: Tendencia del √≠ndice de calidad del aire / Media ($min_interval)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time,$__interval),
  avg(aqi) AS "aqi"
FROM registros
WHERE
  region IN ($Provincia) AND
  city IN ($estacion) AND
  $__timeFilter(time)
GROUP by
  time, city

# Info
- Intervalo de recuperaci√≥n de datos (variable): **$min_interval**
- Fuente: https://waqi.info/

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time,$__interval),
  avg(t) AS "Promedio",
  max(t) as "M√°ximas",
  min(t) as "M√≠nimas"
FROM registros
WHERE
  region IN ($Provincia) AND
  $__timeFilter(time)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time,$__interval),
  avg(h) AS "Promedio",
  max(h) as "M√°ximo",
  min(h) as "M√≠nimo"
FROM registros
WHERE
  region IN ($Provincia) AND
  $__timeFilter(time)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time,$__interval),
  avg(p) AS "Promedio",
  max(p) as "M√°ximo",
  min(p) as "M√≠nimo"
FROM registros
WHERE
  region IN ($Provincia) AND
  $__timeFilter(time)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT

WHERE
  region IN ($Provincia) AND
  city IN ($estacion) AND
  $__timeFilter(time)
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time,$__interval),
  city AS metric,
  avg(no2) AS "no2"
FROM registros
WHERE

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time,$__interval),
  city AS metric,

FROM registros
WHERE
